name: Version 2.2.0
body:
Changelog:

* update sdkVersion to API level 26
* update build tools to 26.0.1
* update support library to version 26.1.0
* fixes in demo project

name: Version 2.1.0
body:
Changelog:

* update support lib to 25.3.1
* _items_ have now protected visibility
* fix bugs with multiple view types

name: Version 2.0.0
body:
Changelog:

* update to support library version 25.2.0
* fix data consistency and concurrent changes problems with DiffUtil
* add support for multiple view types
* updated methods for setting/removing headers and footers to be have the same definition as in ListView
* removed obsolete methods
* updated documentation

name: Version 1.6.0
body:
Changelog:
- update to support library 25.1.1
- fix memory leak on update async task

name: Version 1.5.0
body:
Changelog:
- extracted adapter's ViewHolder and HeaderFooterViewHolder to separate class and rename them to MjolnirViewHolder and MjolnirHeaderFooterViewHolder. This fixes problems with overriding _onBindViewHolder()_ adapter methods
- update to build tools 25.0.2

name: Version 1.4.0
body:
Changelog:
- update logic for inflating footer and header views
- bump to SDK level 25

name: Version 1.3.0
body:
Changelog:
- fixed layout params for headers/footer with LinearLayoutManager
- added header and footer support for GridLayoutManager

name: Version 1.2.1
body:
Changelog:
- fixed memory leak inside UpdateAsyncTask
- fixed broken test examples

name: Version 1.2.0
body:
Changelog:
- added update() method to adapter
- onCreateViewHolder() is now not final, so that it can be modified outside MjolnirRecyclerAdapter
- ViewHolder is now a public class
- added possibility to show empty view when adapter is not set to MjolnirRecyclerView
- fixed bugs with calculating correct index when adapter has header/footer views

name: Version 1.1.0
body:
Changelog:
- added more verbose methods for add/replace header and footer view
- added methods for footer and header removal
- remove setters for header and footer as they are obsolete
